verses.verse: וַיְהִי֩ <WH1961> came כִשְׁמֹ֨עַ <WH8085> had heard אֲדֹֽנִי־ צֶ֜דֶק <WH139> Now it came to pass when Adonizedek מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem כִּֽי־ <WH3588> how לָכַ֨ד <WH3920> had taken יְהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <WH3091> Joshua אֶת־ <WH853> הָעַי֮ <WH5857> Ai וַיַּחֲרִימָהּ֒ <WH2763> and had utterly destroyed כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> he עָשָׂ֤ה <WH6213> it as he had done לִֽירִיחוֹ֙ <WH3405> to Jericho וּלְמַלְכָּ֔הּ <WH4428> and her king כֵּן־ <WH3651> so עָשָׂ֥ה <WH6213> so he had done לָעַ֖י <WH5857> to Ai וּלְמַלְכָּ֑הּ <WH4428> and her king וְכִ֨י <WH3588> for הִשְׁלִ֜ימוּ <WH7999> had made peace יֹשְׁבֵ֤י <WH3427> and how the inhabitants גִבְעוֹן֙ <WH1391> of Gibeon אֶת־ <WH854> with יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> with Israel וַיִּֽהְי֖וּ <WH1961> came בְּקִרְבָּֽם׃ <WH7130> and were among

וַיִּֽירְא֣וּ <WH3372> That they feared מְאֹ֔ד <WH3966> greatly כִּ֣י <WH3588> because עִ֤יר <WH5892> city גְּדוֹלָה֙ <WH1419> [was] a great גִּבְע֔וֹן <WH1391> because Gibeon כְּאַחַ֖ת <WH259> as one עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> cities הַמַּמְלָכָ֑ה <WH4467> of the royal וְכִ֨י <WH3588> and because הִ֤יא <WH1931> it was גְדוֹלָה֙ <WH1419> and because it [was] greater מִן־ <WH4480> than הָעַ֔י <WH5857> than Ai וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אֲנָשֶׁ֖יהָ <WH376> men גִּבֹּרִֽים׃ <WH1368> thereof [were] mighty

וַיִּשְׁלַ֨ח <WH7971> sent אֲדֹנִי־ צֶ֜דֶק <WH139> Wherefore Adonizedek מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem אֶל־ <WH413> to הוֹהָ֣ם <WH1944> unto Hoham מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king חֶ֠בְרוֹן <WH2275> of Hebron וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to פִּרְאָ֨ם <WH6502> and unto Piram מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king יַרְמ֜וּת <WH3412> of Jarmuth וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to יָפִ֧יעַ <WH3309> and unto Japhia מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king לָכִ֛ישׁ <WH3923> of Lachish וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to דְּבִ֥יר <WH1688> and unto Debir מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king עֶגְל֖וֹן <WH5700> of Eglon לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

עֲלֽוּ־ <WH5927> Come up אֵלַ֣י <WH413> to וְעִזְרֻ֔נִי <WH5826> unto me and help וְנַכֶּ֖ה <WH5221> me that we may smite אֶת־ <WH853> גִּבְע֑וֹן <WH1391> Gibeon כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הִשְׁלִ֥ימָה <WH7999> for it hath made peace אֶת־ <WH854> with יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> with Joshua וְאֶת־ <WH854> and with בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> and with the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

וַיֵּאָסְפ֨וּ <WH622> gathered themselves together וַֽיַּעֲל֜וּ <WH5927> and went up חֲמֵ֣שֶׁת ׀ <WH2568> Therefore the five מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> kings הָאֱמֹרִ֗י <WH567> of the Amorites מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king חֶבְר֤וֹן <WH2275> of Hebron מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king יַרְמוּת֙ <WH3412> of Jarmuth מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king לָכִ֣ישׁ <WH3923> of Lachish מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king עֶגְל֔וֹן <WH5700> of Eglon הֵ֖ם <WH1992> with וְכָל־ <WH3605> all מַֽחֲנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH4264> they and all their hosts וַֽיַּחֲנוּ֙ <WH2583> and encamped עַל־ <WH5921> against גִּבְע֔וֹן <WH1391> before Gibeon וַיִּֽלָּחֲמ֖וּ <WH3898> and made war עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5921> against

וַיִּשְׁלְח֣וּ <WH7971> sent אַנְשֵׁי֩ <WH376> the men גִבְע֨וֹן <WH1391> of Gibeon אֶל־ <WH413> against יְהוֹשֻׁ֤עַ <WH3091> unto Joshua אֶל־ <WH413> against הַֽמַּחֲנֶה֙ <WH4264> to the camp הַגִּלְגָּ֣לָה <WH1537> to Gilgal לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> saying אַל־ <WH408> nay תֶּ֥רֶף <WH7503> Slack יָדֶ֖יךָ <WH3027> not thy hand מֵֽעֲבָדֶ֑יךָ <WH5650> from thy servants עֲלֵ֧ה <WH5927> come up אֵלֵ֣ינוּ <WH413> against מְהֵרָ֗ה <WH4120> to us quickly וְהוֹשִׁ֤יעָה <WH3467> and save לָּ֙נוּ֙ וְעָזְרֵ֔נוּ <WH5826> us and help כִּ֚י <WH3588> for נִקְבְּצ֣וּ <WH6908> are gathered together אֵלֵ֔ינוּ <WH413> against כָּל־ <WH3605> for all מַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> us for all the kings הָאֱמֹרִ֖י <WH567> of the Amorites יֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> that dwell הָהָֽר׃ <WH2022> in the mountains

וַיַּ֨עַל <WH5927> ascended יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <WH3091> So Joshua מִן־ <WH4480> from הַגִּלְגָּ֗ל <WH1537> from Gilgal ה֚וּא <WH1931> he וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all עַ֤ם <WH5971> he and all the people הַמִּלְחָמָה֙ <WH4421> of war עִמּ֔וֹ <WH5973> with וְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> and all גִּבּוֹרֵ֥י <WH1368> with him and all the mighty הֶחָֽיִל׃ <WH2428> men of valour פ

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <WH3091> unto Joshua אַל־ <WH408> not תִּירָ֣א <WH3372> Fear מֵהֶ֔ם <WH1992> like כִּ֥י <WH3588> into בְיָדְךָ֖ <WH3027> them into thine hand נְתַתִּ֑ים <WH5414> them not for I have delivered לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יַעֲמֹ֥ד <WH5975> of them stand אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> there shall not a man מֵהֶ֖ם <WH1992> like בְּפָנֶֽיךָ׃ <WH6440> before

וַיָּבֹ֧א <WH935> therefore came אֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <WH413> about יְהוֹשֻׁ֖עַ <WH3091> Joshua פִּתְאֹ֑ם <WH6597> unto them suddenly כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַלַּ֕יְלָה <WH3915> all night עָלָ֖ה <WH5927> [and] went up מִן־ <WH4480> from הַגִּלְגָּֽל׃ <WH1537> from Gilgal

וַיְהֻמֵּ֤ם <WH2000> discomfited יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> them before יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel וַיַּכֵּ֥ם <WH5221> and slew מַכָּֽה־ <WH4347> slaughter גְדוֹלָ֖ה <WH1419> them with a great בְּגִבְע֑וֹן <WH1391> at Gibeon וַֽיִּרְדְּפֵ֗ם <WH7291> and chased דֶּ֚רֶךְ <WH1870> them along the way מַעֲלֵ֣ה <WH4609> step בֵית־ חוֹרֹ֔ן <WH1032> to Bethhoron וַיַּכֵּ֥ם <WH5221> and smote עַד־ <WH5704> far עֲזֵקָ֖ה <WH5825> them to Azekah וְעַד־ <WH5704> far מַקֵּדָֽה׃ <WH4719> and unto Makkedah

וַיְהִ֞י <WH1961> become בְּנֻסָ֣ם ׀ <WH5127> And it came to pass as they fled מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> from before יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Israel הֵ֞ם <WH1992> were at בְּמוֹרַ֤ד <WH4174> [and] were in the going down בֵּית־ חוֹרֹן֙ <WH1032> to Bethhoron וַֽיהוָ֡ה <WH3068> that the LORD הִשְׁלִ֣יךְ <WH7993> cast down עֲלֵיהֶם֩ <WH5921> and אֲבָנִ֨ים <WH68> stones גְּדֹל֧וֹת <WH1419> great מִן־ <WH4480> than הַשָּׁמַ֛יִם <WH8064> from heaven עַד־ <WH5704> far עֲזֵקָ֖ה <WH5825> upon them unto Azekah וַיָּמֻ֑תוּ <WH4191> and they died רַבִּ֗ים <WH7227> [they were] more אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> than [they] whom מֵ֙תוּ֙ <WH4191> which died בְּאַבְנֵ֣י <WH68> stones הַבָּרָ֔ד <WH1259> hail מֵאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom הָרְג֛וּ <WH2026> slew בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel בֶּחָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> with the sword ס

אָ֣ז <WH227> Then יְדַבֵּ֤ר <WH1696> Then spake יְהוֹשֻׁעַ֙ <WH3091> Joshua לַֽיהוָ֔ה <WH3068> to the LORD בְּי֗וֹם <WH3117> in the day תֵּ֤ת <WH5414> delivered up יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> when the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣אֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> the Amorites לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> before בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיֹּ֣אמֶר ׀ <WH559> and he said לְעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel שֶׁ֚מֶשׁ <WH8121> Sun בְּגִבְע֣וֹן <WH1391> upon Gibeon דּ֔וֹם <WH1826> stand thou still וְיָרֵ֖חַ <WH3394> and thou Moon בְּעֵ֥מֶק <WH6010> in the valley אַיָּלֽוֹן׃ <WH357> of Ajalon

וַיִּדֹּ֨ם <WH1826> stood still הַשֶּׁ֜מֶשׁ <WH8121> And the sun וְיָרֵ֣חַ <WH3394> and the moon עָמָ֗ד <WH5975> stayed עַד־ <WH5704> Until יִקֹּ֥ם <WH5358> had avenged גּוֹי֙ <WH1471> until the people אֹֽיְבָ֔יו <WH341> themselves upon their enemies הֲלֹא־ <WH3808> not הִ֥יא <WH1931> [Is] not this כְתוּבָ֖ה <WH3789> written עַל־ <WH5921> in סֵ֣פֶר <WH5612> in the book הַיָּשָׁ֑ר <WH3477> convenient וַיַּעֲמֹ֤ד <WH5975> stood still הַשֶּׁ֙מֶשׁ֙ <WH8121> the sun בַּחֲצִ֣י <WH2677> in the midst הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> of heaven וְלֹא־ <WH3808> and did not אָ֥ץ <WH213> and hasted לָב֖וֹא <WH935> not to go down כְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> day תָּמִֽים׃ <WH8549> about a whole

וְלֹ֨א <WH3808> no הָיָ֜ה <WH1961> become כַּיּ֤וֹם <WH3117> And there was no day הַהוּא֙ <WH1931> that לְפָנָ֣יו <WH6440> like that before וְאַחֲרָ֔יו <WH310> it or after לִשְׁמֹ֥עַ <WH8085> hearkened יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> it that the LORD בְּק֣וֹל <WH6963> unto the voice אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> of a man כִּ֣י <WH3588> for יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> for the LORD נִלְחָ֖ם <WH3898> fought לְיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> for Israel פ

וַיָּ֤שָׁב <WH7725> returned יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <WH3091> And Joshua וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> and all Israel עִמּ֔וֹ <WH5973> with אֶל־ <WH413> to הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <WH4264> with him unto the camp הַגִּלְגָּֽלָה׃ <WH1537> to Gilgal

וַיָּנֻ֕סוּ <WH5127> fled חֲמֵ֖שֶׁת <WH2568> But these five הַמְּלָכִ֣ים <WH4428> kings הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> now these וַיֵּחָבְא֥וּ <WH2244> and hid בַמְּעָרָ֖ה <WH4631> themselves in a cave בְּמַקֵּדָֽה׃ <WH4719> at Makkedah

וַיֻּגַּ֖ד <WH5046> And it was told לִיהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <WH3091> Joshua לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying נִמְצְאוּ֙ <WH4672> are found חֲמֵ֣שֶׁת <WH2568> The five הַמְּלָכִ֔ים <WH4428> kings נֶחְבְּאִ֥ים <WH2244> hid בַּמְּעָרָ֖ה <WH4631> in a cave בְּמַקֵּדָֽה׃ <WH4719> at Makkedah

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <WH3091> And Joshua גֹּ֛לּוּ <WH1556> Roll אֲבָנִ֥ים <WH68> stones גְּדֹל֖וֹת <WH1419> great אֶל־ <WH413> against פִּ֣י <WH6310> upon the mouth הַמְּעָרָ֑ה <WH4631> of the cave וְהַפְקִ֧ידוּ <WH6485> and set עָלֶ֛יהָ <WH5921> and אֲנָשִׁ֖ים <WH582> men לְשָׁמְרָֽם׃ <WH8104> by it for to keep

וְאַתֶּם֙ <WH859> you אַֽל־ <WH408> not תַּעֲמֹ֔דוּ <WH5975> And stay רִדְפוּ֙ <WH7291> ye not [but] pursue אַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> after אֹֽיְבֵיכֶ֔ם <WH341> your enemies וְזִנַּבְתֶּ֖ם <WH2179> and smite the hindmost אוֹתָ֑ם <WH853> אַֽל־ <WH408> not תִּתְּנ֗וּם <WH5414> of them suffer לָבוֹא֙ <WH935> them not to enter אֶל־ <WH413> about עָ֣רֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5892> into their cities כִּ֧י <WH3588> for נְתָנָ֛ם <WH5414> hath delivered יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> for the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֖ם <WH430> your God בְּיֶדְכֶֽם׃ <WH3027> them into your hand

וַיְהִי֩ <WH1961> came כְּכַלּ֨וֹת <WH3615> had made an end יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <WH3091> And it came to pass when Joshua וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> and the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel לְהַכּוֹתָ֛ם <WH5221> of slaying מַכָּ֥ה <WH4347> slaughter גְדוֹלָֽה־ <WH1419> great מְאֹ֖ד <WH3966> them with a very עַד־ <WH5704> until תֻּמָּ֑ם <WH8552> till they were consumed וְהַשְּׂרִידִים֙ <WH8300> that the rest שָׂרְד֣וּ <WH8277> [which] remained מֵהֶ֔ם <WH1992> of them וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> of them entered אֶל־ <WH413> about עָרֵ֥י <WH5892> cities הַמִּבְצָֽר׃ <WH4013> into fenced

וַיָּשֻׁבוּ֩ <WH7725> returned כָל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֨ם <WH5971> And all the people אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמַּחֲנֶ֧ה <WH4264> to the camp אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוֹשֻׁ֛עַ <WH3091> to Joshua מַקֵּדָ֖ה <WH4719> at Makkedah בְּשָׁל֑וֹם <WH7965> in peace לֹֽא־ <WH3808> No חָרַ֞ץ <WH2782> none moved לִבְנֵ֧י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel לְאִ֖ישׁ <WH376> against any אֶת־ <WH853> לְשֹׁנֽוֹ׃ <WH3956> his tongue

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> Then said יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <WH3091> Joshua פִּתְח֖וּ <WH6605> Open אֶת־ <WH853> פִּ֣י <WH6310> the mouth הַמְּעָרָ֑ה <WH4631> of the cave וְהוֹצִ֣יאוּ <WH3318> and bring out אֵלַ֗י <WH413> about אֶת־ <WH853> חֲמֵ֛שֶׁת <WH2568> those five הַמְּלָכִ֥ים <WH4428> kings הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these מִן־ <WH4480> from הַמְּעָרָֽה׃ <WH4631> unto me out of the cave

וַיַּ֣עֲשׂוּ <WH6213> And they did כֵ֔ן <WH3651> so וַיֹּצִ֣יאוּ <WH3318> so and brought forth אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> about אֶת־ <WH853> חֲמֵ֛שֶׁת <WH2568> those five הַמְּלָכִ֥ים <WH4428> kings הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these מִן־ <WH4480> from הַמְּעָרָ֑ה <WH4631> unto him out of the cave אֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king יְרוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem אֶת־ <WH853> מֶ֤לֶךְ <WH4428> the king חֶבְרוֹן֙ <WH2275> of Hebron אֶת־ <WH853> מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king יַרְמ֔וּת <WH3412> of Jarmuth אֶת־ <WH853> מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> the king לָכִ֖ישׁ <WH3923> of Lachish אֶת־ <WH853> מֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> [and] the king עֶגְלֽוֹן׃ <WH5700> of Eglon

וַ֠יְהִי <WH1961> become כְּֽהוֹצִיאָ֞ם <WH3318> And it came to pass when they brought out אֶת־ <WH853> הַמְּלָכִ֣ים <WH4428> those kings הָאֵלֶּה֮ <WH428> these אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוֹשֻׁעַ֒ <WH3091> unto Joshua וַיִּקְרָ֨א <WH7121> called יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <WH3091> that Joshua אֶל־ <WH413> about כָּל־ <WH3605> all אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> for all the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel וַ֠יֹּאמֶר <WH559> and said אֶל־ <WH413> to קְצִינֵ֞י <WH7101> unto the captains אַנְשֵׁ֤י <WH582> of the men הַמִּלְחָמָה֙ <WH4421> of war הֶהָלְכ֣וּא <WH1980> which went אִתּ֔וֹ <WH854> for קִרְב֗וּ <WH7126> with him Come near שִׂ֚ימוּ <WH7760> put אֶת־ <WH853> רַגְלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH7272> your feet עַֽל־ <WH5921> on צַוְּארֵ֖י <WH6677> upon the necks הַמְּלָכִ֣ים <WH4428> of these kings הָאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> of these וַֽיִּקְרְב֔וּ <WH7126> And they came near וַיָּשִׂ֥ימוּ <WH7760> and put אֶת־ <WH853> רַגְלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH7272> their feet עַל־ <WH5921> on צַוְּארֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH6677> upon the necks

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH413> about יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <WH3091> And Joshua אַל־ <WH408> not תִּֽירְא֖וּ <WH3372> unto them Fear וְאַל־ <WH408> not תֵּחָ֑תּוּ <WH2865> not nor be dismayed חִזְק֣וּ <WH2388> be strong וְאִמְצ֔וּ <WH553> and of good courage כִּ֣י <WH3588> for כָ֗כָה <WH3602> thus יַעֲשֶׂ֤ה <WH6213> do יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> for thus shall the LORD לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all אֹ֣יְבֵיכֶ֔ם <WH341> to all your enemies אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom אַתֶּ֖ם <WH859> you נִלְחָמִ֥ים <WH3898> against whom ye fight אוֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>

וַיַּכֵּ֨ם <WH5221> smote יְהוֹשֻׁ֤עַ <WH3091> Joshua אַֽחֲרֵי־ <WH310> And afterward כֵן֙ <WH3651> after that וַיְמִיתֵ֔ם <WH4191> them and slew וַיִּתְלֵ֕ם <WH8518> them and hanged עַ֖ל <WH5921> on חֲמִשָּׁ֣ה <WH2568> them on five עֵצִ֑ים <WH6086> trees וַיִּֽהְי֛וּ <WH1961> become תְּלוּיִ֥ם <WH8518> and they were hanging עַל־ <WH5921> on הָעֵצִ֖ים <WH6086> upon the trees עַד־ <WH5704> until הָעָֽרֶב׃ <WH6153> until the evening

וַיְהִ֞י <WH1961> came לְעֵ֣ת ׀ <WH6256> And it came to pass at the time בּ֣וֹא <WH935> of the going down הַשֶּׁ֗מֶשׁ <WH8121> of the sun צִוָּ֤ה <WH6680> commanded יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <WH3091> [that] Joshua וַיֹּֽרִידוּם֙ <WH3381> and they took them down מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> over הָעֵצִ֔ים <WH6086> off the trees וַיַּ֨שְׁלִכֻ֔ם <WH7993> and cast אֶל־ <WH413> into הַמְּעָרָ֖ה <WH4631> them into the cave אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> they נֶחְבְּאוּ־ <WH2244> wherein they had been hid שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> themselves וַיָּשִׂ֜מוּ <WH7760> and laid אֲבָנִ֤ים <WH68> stones גְּדֹלוֹת֙ <WH1419> great עַל־ <WH5921> over פִּ֣י <WH6310> mouth הַמְּעָרָ֔ה <WH4631> in the cave's עַד־ <WH5704> against עֶ֖צֶם <WH6106> [which remain] until this very הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this פ

וְאֶת־ <WH853> מַקֵּדָה֩ <WH4719> Makkedah לָכַ֨ד <WH3920> took יְהוֹשֻׁ֜עַ <WH3091> Joshua בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> And that day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> he וַיַּכֶּ֣הָ <WH5221> and smote לְפִי־ <WH6310> it with the edge חֶרֶב֮ <WH2719> of the sword וְאֶת־ <WH853> מַלְכָּהּ֒ <WH4428> and the king הֶחֱרִ֣ם <WH2763> thereof he utterly destroyed אוֹתָ֗ם <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and every הַנֶּ֙פֶשׁ֙ <WH5315> them and all the souls אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בָּ֔הּ לֹ֥א <WH3808> no הִשְׁאִ֖יר <WH7604> that [were] therein he let שָׂרִ֑יד <WH8300> none remain וַיַּ֙עַשׂ֙ <WH6213> and he did לְמֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king מַקֵּדָ֔ה <WH4719> of Makkedah כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> as he did לְמֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king יְרִיחֽוֹ׃ <WH3405> of Jericho

וַיִּתֵּן֩ <WH5414> delivered יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> And the LORD גַּם־ <WH1571> also אוֹתָ֜הּ <WH853> בְּיַ֣ד <WH3027> thereof into the hand יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <WH3478> of Israel וְאֶת־ <WH853> מַלְכָּהּ֒ <WH4428> it also and the king וַיַּכֶּ֣הָ <WH5221> and he smote לְפִי־ <WH6310> it with the edge חֶ֗רֶב <WH2719> of the sword וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and every הַנֶּ֙פֶשׁ֙ <WH5315> and all the souls אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בָּ֔הּ לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no הִשְׁאִ֥יר <WH7604> that [were] therein he let בָּ֖הּ שָׂרִ֑יד <WH8300> none remain וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <WH6213> in it but did לְמַלְכָּ֔הּ <WH4428> unto the king כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> thereof as he did לְמֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king יְרִיחֽוֹ׃ <WH3405> of Jericho ס

וַיַּעֲבֹ֣ר <WH5674> passed יְ֠הוֹשֻׁעַ <WH3091> And Joshua וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <WH3478> and all Israel עִמּ֛וֹ <WH5973> from מִלִּבְנָ֖ה <WH3841> from Libnah לָכִ֑ישָׁה <WH3923> with him unto Lachish וַיִּ֣חַן <WH2583> and encamped עָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> and וַיִּלָּ֖חֶם <WH3898> against it and fought בָּֽהּ׃

וַיִּתֵּן֩ <WH5414> delivered יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> And the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> לָכִ֜ישׁ <WH3923> Lachish בְּיַ֣ד <WH3027> into the hand יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel וַֽיִּלְכְּדָהּ֙ <WH3920> which took בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <WH8145> it on the second וַיַּכֶּ֣הָ <WH5221> and smote לְפִי־ <WH6310> it with the edge חֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> of the sword וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and every הַנֶּ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> and all the souls אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בָּ֑הּ כְּכֹ֥ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> that [were] therein according to all that he had done לְלִבְנָֽה׃ <WH3841> to Libnah פ

אָ֣ז <WH227> Then עָלָ֗ה <WH5927> came up הֹרָם֙ <WH2036> Then Horam מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king גֶּ֔זֶר <WH1507> of Gezer לַעְזֹ֖ר <WH5826> to help אֶת־ <WH853> לָכִ֑ישׁ <WH3923> Lachish וַיַּכֵּ֤הוּ <WH5221> smote יְהוֹשֻׁ֙עַ֙ <WH3091> and Joshua וְאֶת־ <WH853> עַמּ֔וֹ <WH5971> him and his people עַד־ <WH5704> until בִּלְתִּ֥י <WH1115> no הִשְׁאִֽיר־ <WH7604> until he had left ל֖וֹ שָׂרִֽיד׃ <WH8300> him none remaining

וַיַּעֲבֹ֣ר <WH5674> passed יְ֠הוֹשֻׁעַ <WH3091> Joshua וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <WH3478> and all Israel עִמּ֛וֹ <WH5973> from מִלָּכִ֖ישׁ <WH3923> And from Lachish עֶגְלֹ֑נָה <WH5700> unto Eglon וַיַּחֲנ֣וּ <WH2583> with him and they encamped עָלֶ֔יהָ <WH5921> against וַיִּֽלָּחֲמ֖וּ <WH3898> against it and fought עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5921> against

וַֽיִּלְכְּד֜וּהָ <WH3920> And they took בַּיּ֤וֹם <WH3117> it on that day הַהוּא֙ <WH1931> he וַיַּכּ֣וּהָ <WH5221> and smote לְפִי־ <WH6310> it with the edge חֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> of the sword וְאֵת֙ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> every הַנֶּ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> and all the souls אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בָּ֔הּ בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> that day הַה֖וּא <WH1931> and he הֶחֱרִ֑ים <WH2763> that [were] therein he utterly destroyed כְּכֹ֥ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> according to all that he had done לְלָכִֽישׁ׃ <WH3923> to Lachish פ

וַיַּ֣עַל <WH5927> went up יְ֠הוֹשֻׁעַ <WH3091> And Joshua וְכָֽל־ <WH3605> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <WH3478> and all Israel עִמּ֛וֹ <WH5973> from מֵעֶגְל֖וֹנָה <WH5700> from Eglon חֶבְר֑וֹנָה <WH2275> with him unto Hebron וַיִּֽלָּחֲמ֖וּ <WH3898> and they fought עָלֶֽיהָ׃ <WH5921> against

וַיִּלְכְּד֣וּהָ <WH3920> And they took וַיַּכּֽוּהָ־ <WH5221> it and smote לְפִי־ <WH6310> it with the edge חֶ֠רֶב <WH2719> of the sword וְאֶת־ <WH853> מַלְכָּ֨הּ <WH4428> and the king וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all עָרֶ֜יהָ <WH5892> thereof and all the cities וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הַנֶּ֤פֶשׁ <WH5315> thereof and all the souls אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בָּהּ֙ לֹֽא־ <WH3808> no הִשְׁאִ֣יר <WH7604> that [were] therein he left שָׂרִ֔יד <WH8300> none remaining כְּכֹ֥ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who עָשָׂ֖ה <WH6213> according to all that he had done לְעֶגְל֑וֹן <WH5700> to Eglon וַיַּחֲרֵ֣ם <WH2763> but destroyed אוֹתָ֔הּ <WH853> וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and every הַנֶּ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> it utterly and all the souls אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בָּֽהּ׃ ס

וַֽיִּלְכְּדָ֞הּ <WH3920> And he took וְאֶת־ <WH853> מַלְכָּ֤הּ <WH4428> it and the king וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all עָרֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH5892> thereof and all the cities וַיַּכּ֣וּם <WH5221> thereof and they smote לְפִי־ <WH6310> them with the edge חֶ֔רֶב <WH2719> of the sword וַֽיַּחֲרִ֙ימוּ֙ <WH2763> and utterly destroyed אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> every נֶ֣פֶשׁ <WH5315> all the souls אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after בָּ֔הּ לֹ֥א <WH3808> no הִשְׁאִ֖יר <WH7604> that [were] therein he left שָׂרִ֑יד <WH8300> none remaining כַּאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> he עָשָׂ֜ה <WH6213> as he had done לְחֶבְר֗וֹן <WH2275> to Hebron כֵּן־ <WH3651> so עָשָׂ֤ה <WH6213> so he did לִדְבִ֙רָה֙ <WH1688> to Debir וּלְמַלְכָּ֔הּ <WH4428> and to the king וְכַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> he עָשָׂ֛ה <WH6213> thereof as he had done לְלִבְנָ֖ה <WH3841> also to Libnah וּלְמַלְכָּֽהּ׃ <WH4428> and to her king
